title: Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks Capitals coach Barry Trotz says captain Alex Ovechkin will be a game-time decision against the San Jose Sharks. Post to Facebook Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks Capitals coach Barry Trotz says captain Alex Ovechkin will be a game-time decision against the San Jose Sharks.   WUSA9.com: http://on.wusa9.com/1LsUJti   Join the Conversation To   Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks Associated Press 5:12 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 May 13, 2015; New York, NY, USA; Washington Capitals left wing Alex Ovechkin (8) reacts against the New York Rangers during the third period in game seven of the second round of the 2015 Stanley Cup Playoffs at Madison Square Garden. Mandatory Credit: Adam Hunger-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Adam Hunger, Adam Hunger-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WASHINGTON (AP) - Capitals coach Barry Trotz says captain Alex Ovechkin will be a game-time decision against the San Jose Sharks. Ovechkin missed Washington's morning skate ahead of Tuesday night's game for personal reasons. No other details were given. Ovechkin is a three-time NHL MVP who led the league with 53 goals last season. He had a goal and an assist in Washington's season-opening 5-3 victory over New Jersey on Saturday.
